void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord ) {

    vec2 c = fragCoord - 0.3*iResolution.xy; //definition of center coordinates [-Res.xy/2 ~ Res.xy/2]
    vec2 u = c /min(iResolution.x,iResolution.y); // this is bad, don't do this
    
    u *= mat2( .97, -.1223, -.1223, .997 ); // rot

    float shape4 = clamp(0., .99, exp(900.*( u.x*u.y))); // two quadrants
    float shape1 = clamp(0., .99, exp(700.*(-u.x*u.y))); // other half

    float quantized = // assemble figures
        0.2 * floor(clamp(0., .99, shape4  * shape1) * 5. - fract (iTime/2.0)) ;
    quantized += 0.2* fract (iTime/2.0); // avoid clicky behavior

    fragColor = vec4( max(0., quantized) , 0. , 0. , 1.0); // output: R,G,B,alpha


}
